channel.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 53, "$1000 join"
channel.description:
[Download this episode][1], in which Ian and Andrey discuss names, getting punished for good deeds, fast-food burgers, Authorize.NET, HelpSpot mobile apps, making money from mobile games in the app store, a decade of running HelpSpot and Antair, life checkboxes, HelpSpot 4, and making games.
[1]: http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-53-1000-join/
